wikipedia_page.main: Jonathan Lee (born 10 June) is a British writer, satirist and humorist. He is best known for his satirical work and in particular his spoof diary accounts of cricket captains Andrew Strauss and Ricky Ponting. He is also the co-founder of the British humour website 7 Reasons. He currently authors the successful blog series 'Responsibilities of an adman' and lives in Fulham, London.

response: * Jonathan Lee (novelist) (born 1981), British writer and novelist
* Jonathan Lee (musician) (born 1958), record producer and singer-songwriter from Taiwan
